title: Aluma's big outing paces Hokies to 81-66 win over Georgia Tech - VT hokiesports.com
content: Aluma's big outing paces Hokies to 81-66 win over Georgia Tech  VT hokiesports.com
description: In a night that saw Keve Aluma and Justyn Mutts register their 1,000th career points, Virginia TechÂ powered its way to an 81-66 win against Georgia Tech.
